job_title: Clinic Assistant (Central & 5 Day Work)
description:
Clinical Assistant at Skincentral

Why Should You Join Us?

We are one of the largest dermatology specialist clinics in Hong Kong. We give you options and possibilities to the freedom to believe in what you believe.  We are a family guided by shared values and a commitment. We are a group of people with growth mindset who are always ready to tackle challenges and value the opportunities to solve complex problems. We are a passionate team who are committed to provide the highest quality possible to our clients. If this sounds exciting to you, Welcome to Skincentral.

You have a purpose, unique talents and NOW is the time to embrace it, live it and put it to work. At Skincentral, we value incredible people with incredible skills -but your commitment to a greater cause is something we value even more. This is the heartbeat of our organization and your time will be spent in a supportive, team environment with resources to help you flourish.

Skincentral’s Clinical Assistants are highly-valued and professional team members with an important voice in this organization.  In this role, you will help to perform a variety of medical and cosmetic procedures, as well as certain clerical services. We are looking for an attentive and dedicated individual, with a fine-tuned sense of responsibility, the ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented atmosphere, and a commitment to delivering the highest quality medical and cosmetic care to our valued clients.

What You Can Bring To Us? 

Assist Doctors with medical, cosmetic consultations procedures
Perform  routine clinical and administrative tasks to assist with keeping the clinic running smoothly
Educate patients about pertinent treatment and procedures
Assist patients with their enquiries on various communication channels
Front desk duties- be the faces of Skincentral that we can be proud of

We need individuals who possess the following skillsets:

Excellent customer service skills
Strong interpersonal skills  
A good command of English, Cantonese & Putonghua (written and spoken) 
Ability to work under high pressure and a good team player
A growth mindset to pick up new skills and knowledge quickly
Genuine interests in the field of medical and aesthetics treatments

Skincentral offers our people a true opportunity to live their calling to care while experiencing the support of a comprehensive network, professional growth, trusted leadership, generous benefits and an amazing quality of life with an attractive clinic location at Central. We are proud to provide high quality service to our clients through state-of-the-art technology, clinical resources and professional expertise with a patient-centered approach that emphasizes Skincentral's mission and commitment to quality, compassion and service.

job_title: Behavior Therapist
description:
Kids Connect is an award - winning company that promotes the development of children through behavioral - based programs, social skills programs, school shadowing, and other tailor - made programs in the settings of centers and schools. We adopt a unique approach and are well known in the field.
In the past 10 years in Hong Kong, we have been facilitating the growth and development of children from
kindergarten to high school age. Our evidence - based practice and interactive activities have not only made our clinical program very effective, but also a popular place for children of all ages.
Our clinical team consists of high - quality and professional clinical members who are fun and energetic to support a dynamic and supportive culture and environment for the families and children who come to our services. We are related to the fields of education, psychology, special needs, and training.
We are now looking for committed and passionate candidates who are eager to learn and to make changes to join our professional team!
Responsibilities:
• Conduct Behavioral Intervention, School Enhancement Program, and Social Skills Program
• Implement and create the clients’ clinical plan and ensure a high standard of session quality
• Perform data collection and data analysis to make relevant clinical actions or decisions
• Participate and contribute to team discussions and brainstorming sessions
• Coordinate the necessary clinical components that are aligned with the clinical plan
• Participate in team meetings with the clinical team, school personnel, and parents
  Applicants :
• MUST be smiley, witty, friendly, passionate, and ready to enjoy the children! 
• MUST have relevant training and work experience in the field of education or psychology
• Minimum Bachelor degree in relevant field e.g.: psychology, counseling, education, or special needs education
Board Certified Behaviour Analyst (BCBA) or Board Certified Assistant Behaviour Analyst (BCaBA) would be given the priority for an interview
• Be prepared to laugh and work on Saturday
• Fluent spoken and written English and Cantonese
• Love being part of a fun and energetic team with high standards!
  Application:
Please visit our current website of www.kidsconnect.hk to learn more about us. If you are interested, please send your application and CV directly to [via  Apply Now ]
(All information provided will only be used for recruitment related purpose.)

job_title: [停業逆市招聘] Dermes - 美容師/學徒 (包薪約5個月 | 無需經驗, 獨有包薪全職培訓)
description:
Job Description

Reenex為NEODERM集團旗下的專業醫學美容品牌。集團成立於1997年,憑藉對醫學美容技術的深厚基礎,為全港首間榮獲HKMA優質管理金獎之美容集團。 2005年成立至今,由2002創立至今, reenex膠原自生技術獲FDA及歐盟CE安全及功效認證，一直為每位女性提供最專業、貼心的醫學美容服務。20年來已有超過15萬顧客 親身體現膠原自生的功效，兌現3年不老的承諾。

reenex 網頁: https://www.reenex.com.hk/zh/



有薪專業培訓內容 :

各類美容儀器的運用方法及療效
會客溝通技巧
處理人際關係技巧

工作範圍 :

替顧客進行專業醫學美容療程
為顧客安排電話預約服務
協助銷售公司療程及產品

工作地點 :
旺角 / 尖沙咀 / 銅鑼灣 / 金鐘



工作時間 :
星期一至五: 12-9pm, 星期六: 10-7pm
逢星期日休息, 無需輪班



入職要求:

勤奮, 細心認真, 對工作有熱誠及責任心
具1年或以上醫學美容 / 零售銷售經驗優先 (提供全面有薪培訓)
較少經驗者會考慮成為美容學徒

優厚福利 :

NEO DERM樂意培訓有志加入醫學美容的你成為全面的「醫學美容師」。

試用期後可獲全額資助報讀健康及美容公會 (CHB) 所辦之激光及光學美容治療 (Diploma in Laser & Light Treatments) ，以及「全港獨有」英國iTEC「醫學美容」第四級資格，包括:

高強度聚焦超聲波 (Certificate in Ultrasound)
射頻 (Certificate in Radio Frequency)

美容換膚 (Certificate in Skin Peeling)

有薪在職培訓及良好晉升機會
可觀薪酬、佣金及年終花紅
超時津貼 門診及住院醫療福利
員工購物和療程優惠

description:
Skin Retreat一個革命性創新的生活美容空間。以美容體驗為核心, 由高端創作個人專屬唇膏, 以致一站式的天然美容美體護理療程的分享, 令客人在美容體驗中"尋找到【美】的快樂”。

加入我們，讓您在自由的空間盡展所長，追求自已的事業目標；在雄厚的資源竭盡所能接受挑戰，迅速成長實現心中理想。

網址：www.skinretreathk.com

集團公司：

Skin Retreat 為Global Cosmetics旗下的一個品牌。Global Cosmetics是一間在香港和華南地區最具競爭力的化妝品製造商，產品行銷北美、歐洲和大中華地區，銷售額達數百萬美元以上。革新求變、不断向前、“創造美麗的世界”是Global Cosmetics的願景。

網站：www.global-cosmetics.com



職位：擁有團隊精神美容師

歡迎年青開朗、積極主動、和藹平易可親、對美容充滿熱誠, 擁有美容護理經驗的專業人材加入我們。經培訓後為客人提供專業面部及美體療程，與客人在過程中互動交流、分享美容心得，建立親切友好關係。加入Skin Retreat，成為我們的專業團隊一份子，打破傳統，實現生活化美學。歡迎熱愛美容、傳統美容院行業現狀的美容顧問。與團隊合作透過現代銷售思维及策略，展示品牌的價值，達到客戶的需求來推動銷售，提升業績，並直接向品牌總監滙報。

地區:銅鑼灣

職位要求:

         有責任感及抱有團隊精神

         能操流利粵語, 基本英語及普通話

         解答顧客有關療程資訊

job_title: Operation Executive / Operation Assistant
description:
We are looking for highly driven individuals with a passion for providing excellent skincare services and solutions to their clients!

As a Skincare Specialist or Therapist in Chanel, you will help to create a unique and memorable experience for each client, at every moment and at every point of sales. Combining business orientation and passion for the client, you will be an artist of relation who contribute to the Brand image and help build retail leadership in the market.

Leveraging your unique experiences, Chanel will enable you to…

Provide personalized skincare consultation or flash facial services to clients and propose skincare programs that delivers accurate results to ensure client satisfaction
Share skincare trends and tips with clients to inspire them to use Chanel’s skincare products 
Assist in skincare workshops/seminars and demonstrate brand expertise and professionalism
Achieve sales targets, promote cross-selling, retain, recruit and grow client return rates
Facilitate a seamless omni-channel shopping experience for client

You are energized by…

Being Chanel Ambassador who educates and inspires clients and enriches their experience in using Chanel skincare products
Co-creating stories with and for the client, sharing the brand culture and blending it with the client’s personal story to come up with unique moments made just for them.
Sharing best practices with team and contributing to nourish the collective skincare knowledge and skills

What you can bring to the team…

Your constant stylish and professional image to lead as a role model to upkeep the standards of Beauty Advisors’ grooming
Your knowledge in skincare culture and trends
A pair of good hands to provide excellent facial service
As a proactive self-learner and influencer of skincare practice
Facial certification or experience in a facial salon

At Chanel, we are focused on creating an inclusive culture that nurtures personal growth, contributing to collective progress. We believe the uniqueness of each individual increases the diversity, complementarity and effectiveness of our teams. We strongly encourage your application, as we value the perspective, experience and potential you could bring to CHANEL.

job_title: 醫學美容集團Neo Derm - Elyze纖體美容師/美容學徒 (停業期間不停薪)
description:
Job Description

elyze為NEODERM集團旗下的專業醫學美容品牌。集團成立於1997年,憑藉對醫學美容技術的深厚基礎,為全港首間榮獲HKMA優質管理金獎之美容集團。 2005年成立至今,elyze憑藉獲美國FDA和歐盟CE安全及功效認證的技術,配合專業治療師團隊,為妳訂定個人化修形方案,令美臻至,修出更鍾意的線條。

elyze 網頁: https://elyze.gratus.com.hk/

有薪專業培訓內容 :

各類美容儀器的運用方法及療效
會客溝通技巧
處理人際關係技巧

工作範圍 :

替顧客進行專業醫學美容療程
為顧客安排電話預約服務
協助銷售公司療程及產品

工作地點 :
旺角 / 尖沙咀 / 銅鑼灣 / 金鐘



工作時間 :
星期一至五: 12-9pm, 星期六: 10-7pm
逢星期日休息, 無需輪班



入職要求:

勤奮, 細心認真, 對工作有熱誠及責任心
具1年或以上醫學美容 / 零售銷售經驗優先 (提供全面有薪培訓)
較少經驗者會考慮成為美容學徒

優厚福利 :

NEO DERM樂意培訓有志加入醫學美容的你成為全面的「醫學美容師」。

試用期後可獲全額資助報讀健康及美容公會 (CHB) 所辦之激光及光學美容治療 (Diploma in Laser & Light Treatments) ，以及「全港獨有」英國iTEC「醫學美容」第四級資格，包括:

高強度聚焦超聲波 (Certificate in Ultrasound)
射頻 (Certificate in Radio Frequency)
微針美容 (Certificate in Skin Needling)
美容換膚 (Certificate in Skin Peeling)
設保證佣金
10天起有薪年假, 生日假期
每天工作8小時
有薪在職培訓及良好晉升機會
可觀薪酬、佣金及年終花紅
超時津貼 門診及住院醫療福利
員工購物和療程優惠

應徵者請按 APPLY NOW申請或 WHATSAPP 簡述工作經驗 9850 9013 (人力資源部) 預約時間面試 / 查詢。(申請資料只作招聘用途, 並絕對保密。)

House of Beauty Limited 以新世代對美的哲學，協助顧客增值自我。我們位於銅鑼灣的四層創新美容體驗中心將於今年年初開幕，現誠邀對美容充滿熱誠，積極主動的你加入我們的大家庭。 

工作地點：銅鑼灣

工作時間：星期一至五 11:00-21:00 / 星期六 10:00-19:00

有經驗者薪金可有20K+  (有3個月包薪)

工作職責

         替顧客進行專業護理療程
         提供專業的護理知識給顧客，協助顧客改善皮膚問題
         跟進每位顧客的療程紀錄，並與顧客保持良好的關係
         確保服務及儀器於安全的情況下操作使用

工作要求

         具兩年或以上相關的醫學美容工作經驗
         持有國際認可之專業美容證書者獲優先考慮
         有意於美容行業發展，積極態度學習
         為人誠實勤奮，待客由心出發，良好團隊精神
         語言：基本英語、國語及能操流利廣東話

福利包括:

優厚底薪及佣金 / 醫療及牙科保險 / 勤工獎金 / 年終花紅 / 員工購物優惠  / 專業在職培訓 / 良好晉升機會 / 每月7天例假 / 有薪年假12天

有興趣應徵者請按"APPLY NOW"將履歷表，預期薪金及相片傳送到人力資源部
如有任何查詢，歡迎WhatsApp 5743 7707了解更多。

(申請人所提供之全部資料絕對保密及只供招聘用途)

job_title: ABA Therapists
description:
Responsibilities:

-          Assist Doctor to provide patient diagnose / consultation

-          Assist Doctor to administrate consultation and training for child psychological disease

-          Assist Doctor to implement child developmental scales and tools

-          Support different discipline of professional and specialties (E.g., Clinical Psychologist, Speech Therapy, Psychiatrist Pediatrician, Occupational Therapy, etc.)

-          Perform / Assist ABA training, behaviour training

Requirements

-          Passionate, enjoy to work with children

-          Good communicate skills

-          Bachelor degree with experience for children with SEN preferred (Autism/ADHD)

-          Excellent command in English, Cantonese and Mandarin

-          Basic knowledge for Microsoft office

-          Professional certification of RBT, BCaBA, BCBA is preferable

Interested candidates please click APPLY NOW to send your CV with current and expected salaries to us; Personal data collected by job applicants will be kept in strict confidence and used for recruitment purpose only.
selling_points: Experience for children with SEN preferred

description:
工作簡介 :

• 為美容院客戶及其美容師提供療程專業培訓
• 進行美容療程示範,向美容院客戶推廣我司的品牌
• 编制培訓手冊和翻譯產品資訊
• 處理與培訓部門有關的行政工作

職位需求 :
• 至少 3 年美容培訓經驗
• 須通過 ITEC 、 CIBTAC 或 CITY & GUILDS 考核並取得相關 資格
• 良好溝通能力,積極有責任感, 以客為先

• To provide professional training to beauty salon clients and their beauticians 
• To conduct treatment demonstration and promote our brands to beauty salon clients
• To prepare training manual and translation of product information
• To handle administrative duties related to training 

Requirement:
• At least 3 years experiences in beauty industry
• Trainer must be qualified from either ITEC, CIBTAC or CITY & GUILDS examination boards • Good interpersonal skills, self-motivated and customers-oriented
• Good command of spoken and written of English & Chinese
• Good knowledge in computer software such as Excel, Word, PowerPoint

We offer: 9:30am - 6pm working  hours, 5-day work per week, 12 days annual leave, birthday leave, free skincare products, medical and dental subsidy to the right candidates.  All information will be kept in strict confidential and for recruitment purpose only.  Please email your CV by clicking "Apply Now"  to the attention of Administrative Manager or whatsapp to 92370168 Attention to Ms. Tam


Personal data will be used for recruitment purpose only.

job_title: 按摩師
description:
Branding Specialist

Responsibilities

Branding & Marketing Duties ( Minus+ & all brands under)

- Produce proposal package in order to develop, maintain and improve relationships with existing and new clients and enhance customer experiences and engagements
- Support the delivery of key marketing / branding plans across our social media platforms. Create, implement and optimise creative and eye-catching campaigns across various social channels to attract target audience
- Follow up all commercial and retail events, promotions, ensure to align with brands’ direction. understand business objectives and be able to transform into digital KPIs
- Work closely with the Creative & Production team to co-develop creative digital marketing campaign ideas and proposals for new business pitches
- Ensure produced content to be on-brand and fit audience’s media consumption behavior across various digital channels
- Generate regular report, analyze metrics to offer recommendations
- Involve in other editing or photo shooting work, if required

VM Duties ( Spa Centres and Studio)

- Ensure strict compliance with Company and Brand directions in merchandise presentation standard
- Assist with the ordering and co-ordination of installation of promotional material in order to enhance products, create interest and generate sales
- Assist with the planning and implementation of monthly/ ocassional VM changes, seasonal installations, marketing activation, etc.
- Prepare photo reports of changes to the Headquarters
- Ensure all in-store signage is in line with Company standard
- Work closely with Marketing & Production team to assess signage needs
- Source & design props and other display fittings and materials
- Coach Spa Centre team on design concepts, visual display standards, maintenance of the overall display in order to support the ongoing marketing campaigns
- Support and handle ad hoc projects as assigned

job_title: Manager, Enterprise Sales
description:
Axiom is the global leader in high-caliber and diverse legal talent. We have established ourselves as the leading disruptor within the world's second largest business services industry. And we're only getting started.
We work with in-house legal teams at some of the most innovative companies in the world across various sectors – financial services, life sciences, energy, technology, entertainment & media, consumer products and more – to help solve their most pressing challenges.

About us:
We exist to inject new energy and new thinking into a precedent-bound profession. We love the company we're building with undignified enthusiasm. We're committed to our mission and to our people. We celebrate our successes, learn from our failures, and find opportunity in adversity. We surround ourselves with inspiring, talented people who have a contagious energy and incurable passion for what they do. We pride ourselves on listening and relating to our colleagues and clients in a way that's genuine, human, and memorable. We care about the little things.

The Role
We are looking to hire an experienced B2B Sales Manager to fuel our continued growth. With our backing and proven success, we're looking for evangelists – a sales person who can envision a better future for clients, bring clients to see that vision, and create lasting partnerships that exceed clients' greatest expectations. This role is well-suited for a highly consultative seller who's accustomed to sitting at the table with executive-level decision makers to devise solutions to their toughest problems. You will be afforded a high degree of accountability and ownership over a portfolio of industry leading clients focusing on account growth as well as new business generation.
Specifically, this role is accountable for:
• Personally defining the client experience by building durable relationships, inspiring trust, and thought-leading with innovative solutions.
• Carrying an annual sales quota.
• Originating and selling multi-million-dollar business opportunities and managing the growth of existing client relationships.
• Developing account plans for the client vertical. Developing and driving strategic business decisions that positively impact the practice, with an eye toward double-digit growth.
• Collaborating across service/product lines to cross-sell larger, strategic opportunities.
• Keeping a constantly strategic lens on our supply of lawyers, working closely with our lawyer recruiters to ensure that our lawyer recruiting efforts yield the right number and mix of lawyer for client engagements.
• Thriving in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment where business is never "as usual."

Successful candidates
Relevant skills and background are necessary, but successful Axiomites exhibit much more. In addition to the requirements listed below, ideal candidates must demonstrate a relentless service orientation, effortlessly form trusted-advisor relationships, be catalytic in their desire to improve the status quo, remain mission-focused and highly accountable at all times, and be able to operate effectively within a highly collaborative team environment.
Beyond these characteristics, here are the required skills, knowledge, capabilities, and education:
• Extensive experience in a B2B, highly consultative, commercial role in which you were personally accountable for generating new sales and growing/managing existing client relationships.
• Consultative and/or solutions selling experience is required.
• Experience managing longer sales cycles independently and effectively, from origination through engagement management.
• Exceptional solutioning and problem-solving skills. Experience crafting client solutions from scratch based on a fundamental understanding of their needs.
• Proven ability to collaborate and influence across organizational boundaries within a highly matrixed sales organization. Effective as an individual contributor and as part of a broader team.
• High-impact communication and presentation skills.
• Superb time-management, organizational, and project-management skills.
• Understands key financial concepts like profit and loss, gross and net margin, and pricing.
• Proficiency across the Microsoft Office suite.
• Fluency in Chinese and English, both written and verbal.
• Legally eligible to work in Hong Kong.
• Bachelor's degree, or equivalent.

Accommodation for Individuals with Disabilities: Upon request and consistent with applicable laws, Axiom will attempt to provide reasonable accommodations for individuals with disabilities who require an accommodation to participate in the application process. To request an accommodation to complete the application form, please contact us at Apply Now and include "Applicant Accommodation" in the subject line.

job_title: 兼職推拿師**
description:
Exciting Job Opportunity for a Cognitive Scientist (Digital Therapeutics) in HIGH POTENTIAL Startup from #HKU, #Cyberport
*Salary is negotiable, long term employees are eligible for option shares.

Job Description
Core member in our Research and Clinical Team where you’ll be developing and validating our digital therapeutic modules targeting comorbid chronic conditions. These treatment modules are closely developed between the Cognitive Scientists, Software developers and Data Scientists. This also involves communication with the internal and external research team, leading towards the regulatory approval of the product.

Why Hollo?
Our team is focused on a Radical Digital First approach to mental health, being part of the team means you’re contributing to the early stage development of our high potential startup. By becoming a key member of the team, you’re not only leading the clinical direction of the team, but holding an opportunity to help millions of people.  

This position holds potential for your Clinical or Research career around digital health and bridged academic/private research. Our team is growing fast, leading to many new opportunities to work with great patients, doctors, hospitals, pharma, researchers, and academic bodies. 

Responsibilities
• Source and utilize verified information to design engaging Digital Therapeutics activities based off of treatment manuals of CBT, MEST, etc. in English and Chinese 
• Design novel treatments targeting Chronic patients Comorbidity with Mental Health in English and Chinese
• Provide manuals, guidelines, and SOPs on how to use the module material.
• Present findings to both technical and non-technical personnel effectively.
• Work with Clinical Professionals to review, reflect, and improve the designed protocol for Clinical Quality Assurance.
• Work in a cross-functional environment with Software Engineers, Data Scientists, Regulatory, and Business teams.
Lead the validation of the efficacy of the (digital) interventions with University Research Partners. 
• Publish findings with University Research Partners, potentially for peer reviewed journal publications.
• Manage the project timelines, working closely with Founders to establish funding requirements.

Skills and Qualifications
Master’s degree or above in Psychology, Cognitive Science, Psychiatry, (or any related discipline)
Potential experience with Digital Health Solutions (digital solutions in mental health preferred) will be helpful
• Some experience in managing timelines, logistics of clinical studies/academic studies
Able to work without perfect information (startups tend not to have all the required info to start on a new project)
• Excellent written communication skills – Ability to write effectively for potential peer reviewed journals
• Strong digital, research and planning skills
• A curious growth mindset and are also comfortable coaching other leaders by making suggestions and taking initiative on challenging and ambiguous problems.
• Experience in working in real-life human trials/experiments

Benefits 
• Strongly competitive Salary
• Progressing Academic and Professional Career simultaneously.
• Strong Benefits program 
• Empathetic Time-off and Maternity/Paternity leave.
Share / Stock Options (Early employment exclusives)

Language
(Required) English and (Preferably) Chinese

Location
iDendron, 2/F Pao Siu Loong Building, The University of Hong Kong. Or Remote/Hybrid available
